charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) &; 841(b)(1)(C) (On or about 10/8/92 Possession of Cocaine with intent to Distribute it) NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Judgment of court defendant committed to BOP for a term of Twenty-One Months as to Ct. I. Pay restitution in the sum of $100.00 and $50.00 Special Assessment as to Ct. I. Upon release from confinement, defendant placed on supervised release for a term of Three Years. Ct. II dismissed on motion of the Government with prejudice. Dft to surrender on 9/14/94 by 2:00 p.m. Dft's bail to remain in force. (1)

charges.charge_description: 18:922(g)(1) &; 924(e) (On or about 10/8/92 Possession of Firearm by Convicted Felon) FIREARMS (2)

charges.charge_disposition: On Motion of the Government, Ct. II dismissed with prejudice. (2)
